channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: AI video commercials are starting to spread, but people won't trust uncanny valley endorsements
item.description: As AI-generated avatars replace real people in commercials, brands risk losing consumer trust to an uncanny, emotionally hollow marketing strategy.

item.title: How to watch The Smashing Machine: See Dwayne Johnsons Mark Kerr biopic at home
item.description: Is "The Smashing Machine" streaming yet? Find out how to watch Dwayne Johnson's Mark Kerr biopic.

item.title: Election night at Kalshi HQ
item.description: This is an excerpt of Sources by Alex Heath, a newsletter about AI and the tech industry, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. At 8PM on election night in New York City, I arrived at an unmarked office building in the Meatpacking District. Inside, a few dozen young Kalshi employees moved between […]

item.title: What is the release date for Maxton Hall season 2 episodes 1-3 on Prime Video?
item.description: Maxton Hall season 2 is so close, we can almost taste it – but not all episodes are coming to Prime Video straight away.
